body.name: Joorniao Retro Handheld Game Console with 500 Classical Games, Portable Retro Video Game Console with 3.0-Inch Screen, 1020mAh Rechargeable Battery Support TV Output & 2 Players Gift for Boys(BLK)

features: 【500 Classic games】Built-in 500 classic games, this mini retro console includes sports, adventure and puzzle games, as well as intelligence and educational games related to memory, math and logic. No card to download, no extra cost. It's got all the classic retro games you could ever want to play.

【2 Players & Play on TV】Package includes game console, USB cable and AV output cable. Connect the controller to a small handheld game console to play two-player games. You can also connect the 3.0-inch LCD screen to your TV via the AV output to get the double pleasure of a larger screen.

【Compact and Light】The 150g game console weighs less than a bottle of drinking water and takes up no space, making it easy to put in your pocket when traveling. Play with it wherever you go. Take it with you when you go out.

【1020mAh Rechargeable Battery】Built-in 1020mAh large capacity lithium battery, each full charge can play for up to 5 hours. Cycle charge, convenient and safe. Don't worry about running out of power when you're on a business trip, traveling, or camping. (Tip: Fully charge the battery before first use)

【Magical Gift for Children and Adults】This children's handheld game console is the ideal gift for children and adults on birthdays or any occasion. The value of this gift will increase over time. Savor your childhood memory together! If you have any questions during the use, please feel free to contact us. Buy it now to get: (1) Game Console; (2) USB Cable; (3) AV Output Cable; (4) User Manual.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 3.0 Inch Retro FC Video Games Handheld Game Console 500 games in one portable game console! The ultimate multimedia excitement for everything you love! 100% premium quality. With 500 built-in games, you can play whenever and wherever you want.

Classic 80s 90s Retro Games ——Retro Handheld Game Console Whichever and whatever you like, there must be a game for you. Just have a try, and experience the dissimilar enjoyment which this Retro Handheld Game Console brings for you! A great way to diffuse stress on life and work. Bring you happy and give you a wonderful childhood memories.
Package includes: 1 x Game Console1 x Gamepad1 x Built-in battery1 x USB Cable1 x AV Output Cable1 x User Manual
Spice up all your boredom at once and spend your free time having fun with our handheld game console.

Perfect Gift for Children The Retro FC Video Games Handheld Game Console is light and portable, perfect for carrying on long trips. The Handheld Game Console works for four to six hours. It's mini and easy to store. From this, you can easily spice up the boredom of a long trip and immerse yourself in a fun handheld console game for children.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars THIS IS GREAT!
reviews.reviewText: I don't know why there were so many bad reviews. Most were for the controller not working. You have to make sure the batteries are put in, the small card put into the system and have the hdmi plugged in correctly. Also, there is a switch on front of controller that turns it on and off. Yes, some of the games are labeled incorrectly but if you look at the picture of the game as well you will figure that part out. Yes some of the wording is in Japanese but it does not affect the game playing. I am reliving my childhood playing Mario, Milipede, Pac Man and Mrs Pacman, Donkey Kong and so many more I have yet to dive into. There are many I don't play but there are a ton I do play. Every great once in awhile it might freeze but you just restart it. No big deal! I love it and recommend it to everyone! :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was geeked to play all the games I played as a kid and a young adult. Opened and connected device. Graphics and navigation are challenging and poorly orchestrated. It’s a lot of nothing, the games I wanted to play I could not access. The games I had access to, I didn’t want to play. Waste of time and money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Grandkids love it!
reviews.reviewText: Terrific buy. We're currently snowed in and this has kept my grandkids occupied and entertained.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This gaming retro controller is awesome. It has so many games on it. Only a few games do have lag like other people have mentioned but most of them are still playable and are decent. Love how it has basically every major title from the past.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: my son liked it. He wanted to play some of the older games from when I was young and I was able to let him do it without much cost.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Portable Retro Video Game Console
reviews.reviewText: This is an awesome buy to keep kids entertained on the go. It works great without available internet and is just the right size! My daughters love it & had a lot of fun with so many games to choose from.
